description: This is a Dart source file defining theming utilities for a Flutter application. It includes functions to generate a ThemeData object based on specified primary, secondary, and accent colors, with detailed theme configurations for various UI components.

classes.name: ThemeData
classes.description: Represents the overall theme configuration for a Flutter application.

methods.name: buildLightTheme
methods.description: Builds and returns a ThemeData object configured for a light theme with customizable primary, secondary, and accent colors.

methods.name: _hex
methods.description: Converts a hex color string to a Color object.
